content:
PartitionDescription PartitionDescription Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents the metadata and approximate runtime information for a logical partition of an Event Hub.

Syntax

Declaration

[DataContract(Name = "PartitionDescription", Namespace = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2010/10/servicebus/connect")]
public sealed class PartitionDescription : EntityDescription, IExtensibleDataObject, IResourceDescription<DataContract(Name:="PartitionDescription", Namespace:="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2010/10/servicebus/connect")>
Public NotInheritable Class PartitionDescription
    Inherits EntityDescription
    Implements IExtensibleDataObject, IResourceDescription

    Object
  • EntityDescription
    EntityDescription
  • PartitionDescription
    PartitionDescription

Gets the approximate size, in bytes, of the Event Hubs partition.
